title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered. However, when opening the working set dialog again, creating a second working set, and deleting the first one, unexpected changes occur.
EB: I expect that when I remove a working set, it should not immediately cause changes to the package view. The package view should remain as it was before removing the working set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it, so the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again.
3. Create a second working set.
4. Delete the first working set. The issue should become apparent during these steps.
